Question: Remove corn husk easily.

Q: To quickly peel tomato skins off of tomatoes,
O: (A) bring a pot of water to a rolling boil on the stove top.  Drop a ripe tomato into ice water to blanch it.  When the skin starts to split at the top of the tomato, pull the tomato out and put it into the pot of boiling water.  Use your hands to peel the skin off. (B) bring a pot of water to a rolling boil on the stove top.  Drop a ripe tomato into the boiling water to blanch it.  When the skin starts to split at the top of the tomato, pull the tomato out and put it into a bowl of ice water.  Use your hands to peel the skin off.
